parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the environment actions are listed.

parameters.name: environmentIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the envrironment whose environment actions are listed.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone domain ID of the environment action.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The environment ID of the environment action.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment action.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the environment action.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters of the environment action.

nested_items.name: awsConsoleLink
nested_items.description: The console link specified as part of the environment action.

nested_items.name: uri
nested_items.description: The URI of the console link specified as part of the environment action.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of environment actions is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of environment actions, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListEnvironmentActions to list the next set of environment actions.
